alert.note: Alert for Cimarron (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 11 at 11:46PM CDT until June 12 at 12:45AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Cimarron County in the Panhandle of Oklahoma... * Until 1245 AM CDT. * At 1146 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles east of Wheeless, or 12 miles west of Boise City, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Boise City, Keyes, Griggs and Sturgis. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
